Product Description

Tileon’s Fashion for Pets

Do Paw Grooming At Home Easily

Little & Lovely Clippers for Dogs and Cats

Compact & Handy

Strong cutting powerSuitable for small/large pets

Human Engineering Design

Handy & convenientOne click to start/end

Strong Cutting Power

6000rpm motor bladeHigh rotating speedProvides strong and lasting power to the running blades

Whole Body Waterproof

Wash it under the tab directlyClean it with the brush

Charging Indicator

USB portable chargingRed light while chargingGreen light after fully charged

Low Noise Design

Ultra quiet,with noise level less than 50dBTileon pet clipper will cut smoothly and efficientlyIt will help your pet feel at ease,not afraid of hair trimming any more.

How to clean the blade

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 5.08 x 2.8 x 2.64 inches; 6.38 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 17, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Tileon
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B092T7ZGFQ
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Safe & Sharp Clipping Blade — Sharp stainless steel and ceramic blade,with round head design,you can do the grooming at home easily and safely.
Washable & USB Rechargeable — Large capacity lithium-ion battery,can be charged via USB cable anytime,you can trim you pet in the garden or any other outdoor occasions.The blade is detachable and washable directly under the water tab,you can clean the hair with the brush easily.
Long Time Power Supply — The pet clipper built-in powerful & rechargeable lithium-ion battery,it can work 90 minutes of cordless operating after 3 hours fully charged,it can keep home pet grooming running continuously,no more worries about power off when working.
Warm Tips for Pet Trimming — If your pets have thick and long coats, please do use the scissor to cut shorter firstly. Or else the clipper may get jammed up while trimming.

This multipurpose dermaplaning tool and face razor expertly shapes eyebrows, easily removes ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $5.67
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:15:51 UTC – Details)


Look your best at a moment’s notice! Whether you’re looking for an eyebrow razor, face shaver, or peach fuzz remover, our Schick Hydro Silk Touch-Up is a great all-in-one option that’s the perfect addition to your beauty routine. This multipurpose dermaplaning tool and face razor expertly shapes eyebrows, easily removes fine hairs by dermaplaning, and gently exfoliates and smooths your skin. Its blade is designed with fine micro-guards to help protect your skin, and it comes with an added precision cover for precise eyebrow shaping. It also makes a great travel razor, for fine-tuning on the go.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 0.43 x 3.15 x 7.95 inches; 0.96 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 10841058001178
UPC ‏ : ‎ 841058001171
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Edgewell Personal Care
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0787GLBMV
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA
Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

Create Beautiful Brows – Includes a precision cover for precise eyebrow shaping.
High-Quality Blades – Dermaplaning tool uniquely designed with fine micro-guards to help protect your skin from nicks and irritation.
Anytime, Anywhere – Slim, portable-sized travel razor lets you take it wherever you go, so you’re always ready for a last-minute touch-up.
Convenience – Hydro Silk Touch-Up tools can be recycled using our mail back program.
Schick Hydro Silk Touch-Up Exfoliating Dermaplaning Tool Pack includes 3 disposable razors + 1 precision cover.

Read more

Look your best at a moment’s notice! Schick Hydro Silk Touch-Up razors quickly shape eyebrows and easily remove fine hairs. You can even gently exfoliate and smooth your skin. The high-quality blades feature fine microguards to help protect skin. The set includes 3 razors and 1 Precision Cover for precise eyebrow shaping.

Read more

Features and Benefits

Expertly Shapes Eyebrows

Easily style eyebrows and carefully touch-up stray hairs with the Precision Cover—an extra attachment included with purchase.

Smoothes and Exfoliates

Gently exfoliates, leaving skin feeling soft and smooth.

Comfortably Removes Fine Hairs

High-quality blade is uniquely designed with fine microguards to help protect your skin.

Free Yourself from Unwanted Hair

No need to worry that shaving might cause hair to grow back thicker—it’s simply untrue. With Schick Silk Touch-Up, you can comfortably remove unwanted hair from your face.

Read more

Read more

Read more

item.title: oneisall Dog Shaver Clippers Low Noise Rechargeable Cordless Electric Quiet Hair Clippers Set for Dogs Cats Pets
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand oneisall Founded in 2012 oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. “oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming. Behind the “oneisall” brand is ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $49.99 - $27.05
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:08 UTC – Details)

From the brand

oneisall

Founded in 2012

oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience.

“oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming.

Behind the “oneisall” brand is the story of pet lover Peter. He found that taking dog for grooming would cost hundreds of dollars every month, and dog’s feeling was not good. Every time the clipper’s noise scared Joe. So Peter set out to design a low-noise and easy-to-use clipper.

Most popular products

Why do we love what we do?

At oneisall, our passion is pets,which drives us to produce the best possible products for our furry friends.We are borned from love for furbabys.

What makes our products unique?

We focus on making products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. Leave the customer feedbacks in our top priority and put them into the design of products.

What’s our vision

oneisall hopes that we can bring peace of mind and quality to every pet owner, so that every pet can grow strong and healthy, and pet owners ca obtain longer and happier companionship.

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.62 x 7.52 x 2.44 inches; 1.23 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 26225202-003DE
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required.
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ oneisall
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01HRSZRXM

Safe and Sharp Blade. Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade and ceramic moving blade can provide excellent cutting performance. The blade sharp enough for a long time using. Detachable blades,easy to change and clean.
Low vibration and ultra quiet design.The noise when working is only about 50 db, to help the pet feel at ease, not afraid cut hair any more.
6 guard combs(3mm/6mm/9mm/12mm/15mm/18mm). The adjustable clipping comb is applicable for clipping hair of different lengths; and the detachable guide combs make for quick, easy comb changes and increased versatility.
Please Note: if your pets get long and thick hair, you need to use scissors cut shorter at first, otherwise the clippers may jam up and don’t work properly.

Safe and Sharp Blade

Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade and ceramic moving blade can provide excellent cutting performance and long life.

Wireless and Rechargeable

Rechargeable dog clippers with built-in battery. It can be used cordless and also used when charging.

Detachable Blades

Detachable blade for ease of changing and cleaning,which offer ultimate grooming versatility.

Make Grooming Easy

Inclued a stainless steel scissor,a stainless steel comb,a oil bottle and 6 guide guards (3mm, 6mm, 9mm, 12mm,15mm and 18mm).

Read more

Dog Cilpper(5 Speed)
Dog-Pro Cilpper(2 Speed)
